visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The x-axis displays month categories with styled labels, and the y-axis has a title and styled labels for temperature values. The legend is positioned to the right and vertically aligned at the top. The data series includes monthly average temperatures with a custom color (#FF6347). Additional configurations include setting the right margin of the chart to 120 pixels.
